body.raw:
### Hey Legend 😊,

All things here are Software Engineering related! You can subscribe to receive an article straight into your inbox every Sunday on my [Substack](https://daveclintonn.substack.com/).

My posts are a collaborative space, so feel free to reply if:

🧰 There’s a topic you’re curious about and would love to read about on my blog.  
🪜 You know about good resources that could benefit fellow aspiring Software Engineers.  
😁 You just want to say hello. :

I will always be happy to share more with you. Check out my about here :) [About](/about) section.
